name: The Journey - Episode 1: Whatever This Is
name_original: The Journey - Episode 1: Whatever This Is
description:
The Journey - Episode 1: Whatever This Is


From the creators of The Test Trilogy, The Horrorscope Series, and a plethora of other enjoyable titles, comes a brand new series based on relaxation and enlightenment! So grab a snack, a drink of water, take a deep breath, and dive into your psyche as you answer a series of questions that ultimately lead to the first step on your new journey!

Features:


  • Short and sweet
  • Be a part of history with Player - Developer interaction
  • The only game with this theme of its kind
  • Very relaxing and psychological
  • Sit back, relax, and answer in-depth questions to reveal your path
  • Super affordable for a unique experience
  • +Much more!
